snippet: Prince Mohammed served as defense minister in the early 1960s and managed to remain an important political figure after his father, King Saud, was forced from the throne in 1964.
abstract: Prince Mohammed bin Saud, a former Saudi defense minister, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Prince Mohammed served as defense minister in the early 1960s and managed to remain an important political figure after his father, King Saud, was forced from the throne in 1964.

headline.seo: Prince Mohammed bin Saud, Former Saudi Defense Chief, Dies at 78
headline.main: Prince Mohammed bin Saud, Former Saudi Defense Chief, Dies at 78
